answers.author: [Unknown]
answers.text:
Hi Michael, 
I came across NAGDCA paper on the state of the industry that may offer you some of the insights that you were looking for. It is called "The Evolving Role of Defined Contribution Plans in the Public Sector," and you can view it here: http://www.nagdca.org/documents/ANC_NAGDCA_SLGE_The_Evolving_Role_of_Defined_Contribution_Plans_in_the_Public_Sector2.pdf
I hope that this information helps!!
Best,
James
Knowledge Network Intern
ICMA

author: Michael Maniscalco
text: Has anyone done research on what the average employer contribution is for public sector defined contribution retirement plans?
title: Average employer contribution for DC plans
